PDP10·1 | Liliana Vess | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top.
trans-unit.target: [−2]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top.

trans-unit.resname: PDP10·1 | Liliana Vess | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: [−8]: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

trans-unit.resname: PDP10·2 | Nissa Revane | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: PDP10·2 | Nissa Revane | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control.

trans-unit.resname: PDP10·2 | Nissa Revane | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−7]: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
